trans-unit.source: * ability to pinpoint everything for replayability
trans-unit.target: *能够查明所有内容的重播性

trans-unit.source: * dedicated scripts creation for easy integration of external tools,
trans-unit.target: *专用脚本创建，可轻松集成外部工具，

trans-unit.source: * installation of OpenERP server and, if meaningful, GTK and web clients.
trans-unit.target: *安装OpenERP服务器以及GTK和Web客户端（如果有意义的话）。

trans-unit.source: * management of OpenERP configuration
trans-unit.target: * OpenERP配置管理

trans-unit.source: * packaging: creation of self-contained equivalents for easy
trans-unit.target: *包装：轻松创建独立的等效项

trans-unit.source: * retrieval of main software and addons from various sources,
trans-unit.target: *从各种来源检索主要软件和插件，

trans-unit.source: * uniformity across OpenERP versions (from 5.0 onwards)
trans-unit.target: *跨OpenERP版本的一致性（从5.0开始）

trans-unit.source: - Added an 'addons' option allowing remote repositories and local directories
trans-unit.target: -添加了“附件”选项，允许远程存储库和本地目录

trans-unit.source: - Added support for the web client and gtk client
trans-unit.target: -增加了对Web客户端和gtk客户端的支持

trans-unit.source: - Basic tests for Git and Svn
trans-unit.target: -Git和Svn的基本测试

trans-unit.source: - Clean-up and refactoring
trans-unit.target: -清理和重构

trans-unit.source: - Create gtk client config without starting it
trans-unit.target: -创建gtk客户端配置而不启动它

trans-unit.source: - Faster tarball inspection (see lp issue #984237)
trans-unit.target: -更快的tarball检查（请参阅lp问题＃984237）

trans-unit.source: - Fixed an error in user feedback if openerp-command package is missing but
trans-unit.target: -修复了缺少openerp命令包但用户反馈错误的问题

trans-unit.source: - Fixed the licence in ``setup.py`` and hence on PyPI page. The ZPL
trans-unit.target: -修复了许可证在``setup.py''中以及因此在PyPI页面上的问题。ZPL

trans-unit.source: - Handle bad Babel import in setup.py
trans-unit.target: -在setup.py中处理错误的Babel导入

trans-unit.source: - Improved documentation (bootstrap and sample buildouts)
trans-unit.target: -改进了文档（自举和示例扩展）

trans-unit.source: - Improved error messages
trans-unit.target: -改进了错误消息

trans-unit.source: - Initial implementation for the OpenERP server only
trans-unit.target: -仅适用于OpenERP服务器

trans-unit.source: - Make the "dsextras" error more explicit (install PyGObject and PyGTK)
trans-unit.target: -使“ dsextras”错误更明确（安装PyGObject和PyGTK）

trans-unit.source: - Nothing but fix of changelog RST
trans-unit.target: -除了修复变更日志RST

trans-unit.source: - Overwrite config files each time
trans-unit.target: -每次覆盖配置文件

trans-unit.source: - Pass the trailing args to the startup script of the server
trans-unit.target: -将结尾的args传递到服务器的启动脚本

trans-unit.source: - Re-enabled support for trunk nightly (and maybe 7.0 final)
trans-unit.target: -重新启用对夜间行李箱的支持（最终可能是7.0）

trans-unit.source: - Refactor with classes of VCS package
trans-unit.target: -使用VCS软件包类进行重构

trans-unit.source: - Refactored the documentation
trans-unit.target: -重构文档

trans-unit.source: - Removed `url` option (download url supported through `version`)
trans-unit.target: -删除了“ URL”选项（通过“ version”支持下载URL）

trans-unit.source: - SAAS versions now recognized, and treated as X.5
trans-unit.target: -现在可以识别SAAS版本，并视为X.5

trans-unit.source: - Shared downloads and more generally configurable downloads
trans-unit.target: -共享下载和更一般的可配置下载

trans-unit.source: - Support OpenERP 6.1 and 6.0
trans-unit.target: -支持OpenERP 6.1和6.0

trans-unit.source: - Support offline mode of buildout
trans-unit.target: -支持离线离线模式

trans-unit.source: - Updated the documentation
trans-unit.target: -更新了文档

trans-unit.source: - Use dotted notation to add openerp options in the generated configs
trans-unit.target: -使用点分符号在生成的配置中添加openerp选项

trans-unit.source: - [bzr] support for lightweight checkout, with uniform 'bzr-init' option
trans-unit.target: -[bzr]支持轻量级结帐，并带有统一的'bzr-init'选项
